short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1930 is an adorable 2D puzzle platformer where you help the circles survive only when squares die.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1930 Offline Version (Only 3MB)

INTRODUCTION
Play 1930 on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the 1930 extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the 1930 icon on the Chrome toolbar, the 1930 popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Control the circles and squares characters to solve unique puzzles. Overcome all obstacles to make the circles survive.

CONTACT
